metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Pipe Dream has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity and Chord Progression Novelty and below-average scores in Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Pipe Dream has sections analyzed in the following keys: C Minor, G Minor, G Dorian,  and C Dorian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
